mapper.select: /* selectSearchRecruitList 공고 리스트 조회*/ select PBLANC_SN, PBLANC_SJ, PBLANC_CN, PBLANC_WRTER, PBLANC_RGSDE, PBLANC_RDCNT, PBLANC_UPDDE, PRJCT_SN, PBLANC_BGNDE, PBLANC_CLOS_DE, FILE_SN, (select mber_ncnm from member where mber_sn = recruit.pblanc_wrter) as mber_ncnm, (select prjct_sj from project where prjct_sn = recruit.prjct_sn) as prjct_sj from recruit where pblanc_sn is not null order by PBLANC_RGSDE desc

select PBLANC_SN, PBLANC_SJ, PBLANC_CN, PBLANC_WRTER, PBLANC_RGSDE, PBLANC_RDCNT, PBLANC_UPDDE, PRJCT_SN, PBLANC_BGNDE, PBLANC_CLOS_DE, FILE_SN, (select mber_ncnm from member where mber_sn = recruit.pblanc_wrter) as mber_ncnm, (select prjct_sj from project where prjct_sn = recruit.prjct_sn) as prjct_sj from recruit where pblanc_sn is not null
and ROWNUM <= 5
order by PBLANC_CLOS_DE desc

/* selectRecruitByPblanc_sn 공고 번호로 공고 디테일 조회*/ select PBLANC_SN, PBLANC_SJ, PBLANC_CN, PBLANC_WRTER, PBLANC_RGSDE, PBLANC_RDCNT, PBLANC_UPDDE, PRJCT_SN, PBLANC_BGNDE, PBLANC_CLOS_DE, FILE_SN, (select mber_ncnm from member where mber_sn = recruit.pblanc_wrter) as mber_ncnm, (select prjct_sj from project where prjct_sn = recruit.prjct_sn) as prjct_sj, pblanc_stts_code from recruit where pblanc_sn = #{pblanc_sn}
select count(*) from recruit where pblanc_sn is not null order by pblanc_sn desc
mapper.update: insert into recruit (pblanc_sn, pblanc_sj, pblanc_cn, pblanc_wrter, prjct_sn, pblanc_rgsde, pblanc_bgnde, pblanc_clos_de, file_sn) values (#{pblanc_sn}, #{pblanc_sj}, #{pblanc_cn}, #{pblanc_wrter}, #{prjct_sn}, to_char(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{pblanc_bgnde}, #{pblanc_clos_de}, #{file_sn})
mapper.select: select * from project where prjct_crtr=#{prjct_crtr} order by prjct_sn asc
select recruit_seq.nextval as pblanc_sn from dual
mapper.update: update recruit set pblanc_sj = #{pblanc_sj}, pblanc_cn = #{pblanc_cn}, pblanc_bgnde = #{pblanc_bgnde}, pblanc_clos_de = #{pblanc_clos_de}, pblanc_updde = to_char(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), file_sn = #{file_sn} where pblanc_sn = #{pblanc_sn}
mapper.select: /* selectMyRecruitList 내가 작성한 공고 목록 조회*/ select pblanc_sn, pblanc_sj, pblanc_cn, pblanc_rgsde, pblanc_rdcnt, pblanc_updde, prjct_sn, pblanc_bgnde, pblanc_clos_de, (select prjct_sj from project where prjct_sn = recruit.prjct_sn) as prjct_sj, (select count(pblanc_sport_sn) from recruit_apply where pblanc_sn=recruit.pblanc_sn) as apply_cnt from recruit where pblanc_wrter = #{pblanc_wrter} order by PBLANC_CLOS_DE desc
